overview: In the 1960s, a group of friends at an all girls school learn that their school is going to be combined with a nearby all boys school. They concoct a plan to save their school while dealing with everyday problems along the way.
tagline: Get ready for a radical education.
cast: Kirsten Dunst|Gaby Hoffmann|Monica Keena|Rachael Leigh Cook|Lynn Redgrave
